name: Spiritual Connection
description:
A short puzzle-platformer made for the VimJam game jam. This dungeon has mysterious qualities that split up your person into a body and a spirit. Traverse through the level as your normal body with normal traps and obstacles. But once you reach the portal, you switch into the spirit and the world around you changes. All you need to do is get from to portal and back to beat the level.

The downloaded version has better audio.
